Name Department
Priority Doc Type
 
Commodity Information Management
Commodity Type * Commodity Management Number *
Commodity Code *  13 numbers or 8 numbersＪＡＮCourt
Product Name *  ※Please input name here
Product Name *  ※Please input name here
Model Number  i.e G3-1234-"
Size            
Weight  Gram Locality
Brand Color  i.e. brown
Maker
Supplier
Price  USD Selling Price  USD
Explanation
